abilities.name: Dedicated Practice
abilities.description: Each time you play a spell, gain +1/+0

abilities.name: Master's Skill
abilities.description: When this has 8 or more attack, your spells cost 1 less

body.raw:
# Eight of Pentacles

The apprentice works tirelessly, each piece better than the last.

*"Mastery is earned one patient stroke at a time."*
